lines.text: a soldier, minister, priest of God. You will find the Millers, the Mannings, the O'Keefes, in the army camps, in the hospitals, on the high seas and strange lands; in the sky and in the foxholes. A soldier unarmed. Yet, not unarmed; for what better weapons may a man carry with him into battle than those of courage, of unswerving devotion to his faith and to his fellow Man?
